item.title: Quordle Hints And Answers For Tuesday, January 6
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.title: Leak Says ‘Chainsaw Man’ Is Heading To ‘Fortnite,’ Here Are The Likely Skins
item.description: Fortnite will reportedly get a slate of Chainsaw Man skins pretty soon, and we probably know which ones they will be.

item.title: If The Job Was Never The Work, What Is The Right Structure?
item.description: Why jobs no longer define how work gets done, and how organizations are separating execution from employment to create certainty in a distributed, AI-...

item.title: ‘Stranger Things’ Matt Duffer Says He Shouldn’t Have Answered Finale Questions
item.description: After a series of poor answers about the finale of Stranger Things, co-showrunner Matt Duffer says he probably shouldn't have talked about them at all...

item.title: ‘The Beast In Me’ Is About To Set A Netflix Top 10 Record
item.description: The Beast in Me is inching toward what would be a current record on Netflix's top 10 list if it can hold on a few more days.
